Cyber Claw:




Trying to drown out the commotion to ease herself, he mind drifted of 
to a sudden realization. That snake-bot at the base, or whatever he 
was turn out to be the bot that was presumed dead by the Vok. The son 
of a maintenance was alive. She remembered the face they showed her, 
the coloring and the body shape. It had to be him.

She looked around. She went towards Black Arachnia's direction, and 
looked her in the optics. "Black Arachnia, who was that bot who 
showed me in? Your second in command!" Her optics showed too much 
exictement.
